h.rus: Collapsible list group
h.eng: Collapsible list group

p.rus: Flexible plugin that utilizes a handful of classes for easy toggle behavior.
p.eng: Flexible plugin that utilizes a handful of classes for easy toggle behavior.

p.rus: Сворачивание нуждается подключенного в вашей версии Bootstrap плагина transitions.
p.eng: Collapse requires the transitions plugin to be included in your version of Bootstrap.

p.rus: Click the buttons below to show and hide another element via class changes:
p.eng: Click the buttons below to show and hide another element via class changes:

p.rus: You can use a link with the href attribute, or a button with the data-target attribute. In both cases, the data-toggle="collapse" is required.
p.eng: You can use a link with the href attribute, or a button with the data-target attribute. In both cases, the data-toggle="collapse" is required.

p.rus: Link with href
p.eng: Link with href

p.rus: Extend the default collapse behavior to create an accordion with the panel component.
p.eng: Extend the default collapse behavior to create an accordion with the panel component.

p.rus: It's also possible to swap out .panel-bodys with .list-groups.
p.eng: It's also possible to swap out .panel-bodys with .list-groups.

p.rus: Be sure to add aria-expanded to the control element. This attribute explicitly defines the current state of the collapsible element to screen readers and similar assistive technologies. If the collapsible element is closed by default, it should have a value of aria-expanded="false". If you've set the collapsible element to be open by default using the in class, set aria-expanded="true" on the control instead. The plugin will automatically toggle this attribute based on whether or not the collapsible element has been opened or closed.
p.eng: Be sure to add aria-expanded to the control element. This attribute explicitly defines the current state of the collapsible element to screen readers and similar assistive technologies. If the collapsible element is closed by default, it should have a value of aria-expanded="false". If you've set the collapsible element to be open by default using the in class, set aria-expanded="true" on the control instead. The plugin will automatically toggle this attribute based on whether or not the collapsible element has been opened or closed.

p.rus: Additionally, if your control element is targetting a single collapsible element – i.e. the data-target attribute is pointing to an id selector – you may add an additional aria-controls attribute to the control element, containing the id of the collapsible element. Modern screen readers and similar assistive technologies make use of this attribute to provide users with additional shortcuts to navigate directly to the collapsible element itself.
p.eng: Additionally, if your control element is targetting a single collapsible element – i.e. the data-target attribute is pointing to an id selector – you may add an additional aria-controls attribute to the control element, containing the id of the collapsible element. Modern screen readers and similar assistive technologies make use of this attribute to provide users with additional shortcuts to navigate directly to the collapsible element itself.

p.rus: Плагин свертывания использует несколько классов для обеспечения плавного подъема:
p.eng: The collapse plugin utilizes a few classes to handle the heavy lifting:

p.rus: Эти классы можно найти в component-animations.less.
p.eng: These classes can be found in component-animations.less.

p.rus: Just add data-toggle="collapse" and a data-target to the element to automatically assign control of a collapsible element. The data-target attribute accepts a CSS selector to apply the collapse to. Be sure to add the class collapse to the collapsible element. If you'd like it to default open, add the additional class in.
p.eng: Just add data-toggle="collapse" and a data-target to the element to automatically assign control of a collapsible element. The data-target attribute accepts a CSS selector to apply the collapse to. Be sure to add the class collapse to the collapsible element. If you'd like it to default open, add the additional class in.

p.rus: Чтобы до группы элементов, которые могут сворачиваться, добавить управления, похоже на аккордеон, добавьте атрибут данных data-parent="#selector". Посмотрите демонстрацию (выше), чтобы увидеть это в действии.
p.eng: To add accordion-like group management to a collapsible control, add the data attribute data-parent="#selector". Refer to the demo to see this in action.

p.rus: Ручное включение с:
p.eng: Enable manually with:

p.rus: параметры могут передаваться через атрибуты данных или JavaScript. Для атрибутов данных, добавьте приставку названия параметра data, как в примере: data-parent="".
p.eng: Options can be passed via data attributes or JavaScript. For data attributes, append the option name to data-, as in data-parent="".

p.rus: Переключает складной элемент, чтобы его отобразить или скрыть.
p.eng: Toggles a collapsible element to shown or hidden.

p.rus: Отражает складной элемент.
p.eng: Shows a collapsible element.

p.rus: Скрывает складной элемент.
p.eng: Hides a collapsible element.

p.rus: Класс Bootstrap для згортанння представляет несколько событий для подключения функциональности свертывания.
p.eng: Bootstrap's collapse class exposes a few events for hooking into collapse functionality.

li.rus: .collapsing добавляется в начале перехода, и удаляется после его завершения
li.eng: .collapsing is added when the transition starts, and removed when it finishes

td.rus: If a selector is provided, then all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when this collapsible item is shown. (similar to traditional accordion behavior - this is dependent on the panel class)
td.eng: If a selector is provided, then all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when this collapsible item is shown. (similar to traditional accordion behavior - this is dependent on the panel class)
Toggles the collapsible element on invocation

td.rus: Это событие срабатывает во время вызова метода show.
td.eng: This event fires immediately when the show instance method is called.

td.rus: Это событие срабатывает, когда этот элемент отображается пользователю (при этом ожидается завершение навигации CSS).
td.eng: This event is fired when a collapse element has been made visible to the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).

td.rus: Это событие срабатывает во время вызова метода hide.
td.eng: This event is fired immediately when the hide method has been called.

td.rus: Это событие срабатывает, когда развернутый элемент защищен от пользователя (при этом ожидается завершение навигации CSS).
td.eng: This event is fired when a collapse element has been hidden from the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
